observation: Klingspor's Woodworking Shop  Created with Sketch. Toggle menu 800-228-0000 Login or Sign Up 0 Gift Cards My Account Search Reset Search Ã— Forgot your password? Urgent Sales Tax Information Please read thoroughly Please read before going any further or you may find nonrefundable charges at the end of your order that you weren't expecting! Once an online order is placed - SALES TAX CHARGES Are you or your company sales tax exempt? do NOT proceed any further How to Submit Tax Exemption or Make an Inquiry on Status Due to recent changes and regulations, Klingspor's Woodworking Shop has changed its Sales Tax Policy. If you or your company are Sales Tax Exempt and you have NOT submitted your Exemption Certificate for application to your account within the last year salestax@klingsporcorp.com NONREFUNDABLE If you have NOT submitted an updated copy of your certificate or provided us with your Certificate
